description.value:
Acts as Photo-Visors (no penalty from Darkness) and Preysense (+20 to Vision-based Perception Tests in darkness). Can detect various EM Frequencies, has 5x optical enhancement and magnification and various filters. Can also act as a rangefinder for artillery or aeronautica, providing +20 to allied Ballistic Test for these indirect weapons.

Requirements

Often worn by Space Marine Scout Snipers

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 10 R
